replies.msg:
Welcome to LIHKG, please feel free to paste the URLs in LIHKG that you are interested here. We shall try our utmost effort to translate and further discuss with you. Have fun!

One of the LIHKG users

hi reporters

pls take note that lihkg has been seriously infiltrated by china govt n hk govt ppl... instead of reading the post, u can ask questions by creating a new post, we can tell u our views n assist u in finding the relevant footage or information, it might be more efficient...

pls help report the truth to the world...
We look forward to your questions

「Xinnie the Pooh」Challenge


1. Draw your own "Xinnie the Pooh"
2. Write down what do you want to tell Chairman Xi
3. Post your work on ig, fb and twitter with tag #Xinniethepooh
4. Tag up to 3 more friends to draw together!
